statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null || true; git_branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf '\033[36m%s@%s \033[32m%s \033[33m(%s)\033[0m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_branch"; else printf '\033[36m%s@%s \033[32m%s\033[0m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi

hooks.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.cwd // .workspace.current_dir // "unknown"'); project=$(basename "$cwd"); printf '\007'; if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then osascript -e "display notification \"Waiting in $project\" with title \"Claude Code\"" 2>/dev/null; elif command -v notify-send >/dev/null 2>&1; then notify-send "Claude Code - $project" "Claude is waiting for your input"; fi
